VivalaMamaBerlin

Check You Tube:
youtu.be/4IzYYQm9QQ4

Practical, cozy, adaptable and stylish: This baby carrying jacket is a must for moms and their babies! This 3in1 coat can be worn during pregnancy, when carrying your child and later as a normal casual hoodie. A perfect gift for birth and baby showers!


♥ for carrying children of up to 2 years of age (depending on the size of the child)
♥ can be worn over all current baby carriers
♥ can be worn during pregnancy, whilst carrying your baby and also afterwards as casual jacket (loose fit)
♥ very suitable for spring, autumn, mild winters and cool summer nights
♥ comes with 2 easy zip-on inserts: 1 carrying insert for mom + baby, 1 insert for mom without baby
♥ smart lining, long and elastic cuffs
♥ 2 hoods, 2 pockets

♥ hand-stitched with ❤ in the EU, high quality finish
♥ also available in:

-anthracite + red and white stripes
www.etsy.com/listing/247116044
-anthracite + red with dots
www.etsy.com/de/listing/237561164
-black + red and white stripes
www.etsy.com/de/listing/253156302
-navy + red and white stripes
www.etsy.com/de/listing/237123496
-navy + red with stars
www.etsy.com/listing/243859065
-bordeaux - gray with dots
www.etsy.com/listing/258686432


ADDITIONAL BABY SLING/ BABY CARRIER REQUIRED! IS NOT INCLUDED!

❤ materials used/ care:

100% polyester polar fleece, certified in accordance with Öko-Tex 100
both hoods are equipped with an inner lining (95% cotton, 5% elastane); the cuffs are made of 97% cotton and 3% elastane
Wash inside out at 30 ° in the machine (delicates)
do not tumble dry

❤ Size:

S corresponds to size US 8 (EU: 36 // UK: 10)
M corresponds to size US 10 (EU: 38 // UK: 12)
L corresponds to size US 12 (EU: 40 // UK: 14)
XL corresponds to size US 14 (EU: 42 // UK: 16)
XXL corresponds to size US 16 (EU: 44 // UK: 18)

The fleece fabric is elastic and stretches a few inches.
Here you can find our sizing chart: Trio: http://newsletter.vive-la-dame.com/SC_Trio.pdf

♥ Combine TRIO with our lovely nursing shirt BELLY BOO: www.etsy.com/de/listing/236464901
or find other enchanting breast feeding tops in this section:
www.etsy.com/de/shop/VivalaMamaBerlin?section_id=17366898
(Shipping costs for each additional item is only plus 2 €.)

❤ Please note:

THIS ARTICLE DOES NOT REPLACE A BABY CARRIER! THE BABY WEARING JACKET IS TO BE WORN EXCLUSIVELY WITH A SLING OR OTHER BABY/ CHILD CARRIER!

The baby hat is not included.
